Noyu wakanaya nage abya awite olulengero lwomutso wezahabu werilenga omuyi namalimbo wago nebiyite.

Omuyi oyo iniaringirirene oko mbande syosi, oburiburi bwago iburingirirene nobugali bwago; naye mwalenga omuyi nomutso wuwe, kilometres elfu ibiri namagana ani; obuli bwago nobugali noburi bwendata ibiringirene.
Nibya mwalenga ekiyite kyago, ebikango erigana namakumi ani nebini omo lulengo lwomundu, lo lwomulaika.
Ekiyite kyayitawa omo yaspi, nikwa omuyi abya wezahabu nyibuya, ahenirye ngekiyo.
Nemikuro yekiyite kyomuyi yabya ibambire kwamabwe misindo yosi wobuguri bunene; owerimbere abya wa yaspi; owakabiri wa safira; owakasatu wa kaledoni, owakani wa zumaridi;

owakatanu wa sadoniki; owendatu wa sardio; owakarinda wa krisolito; owa munani wa berilo; owa mwenda watopazio; oweikumi wa krisopuraso; oweikumi nomuguma wa waikinto; owa erikumi nibiri wa amazisito.
Namalimbo ikumi nabiri abya esyolulu ikumi nibiri, oburi irimbo ryakoko tibawa omo lulu nguma, nenzira yomuyi yabya yezahabu nyibuyabuya, ngekiyo ekikalabangana mwa meso.
Nage mondalangira ehekalu omo muyi oyo, kusangwa oMukama Mungu owaMaka gosi neKyana kyembuli ibo hekalu yago.
Nomuyi oyo siari nobwaga bweryuba kutse omukera erikolerya kugo, kusangwa olukengerwa lwoMungu ni kya kakala kyago, noluseke lwago ni Kyana kyembuli.
Nebi­handa byasyalendera omo kyakakala kyago; nabami be kihugo basyaleta olukengerwa lwabo mugo,
namalimbo wago siendsyakingwa na kera na kera omwitungi—neyo sibwendisya hombera;
nabo basyaleta olukengerwa nerisikya ryebihanda mugo.
Nikwa sihendisingira mugo ekindu kibi, kutse oyo kakola ebitsandire kutse amabihi, nikwa banabasakirwe omo kitabu kyengebe kyeKyana kyembuli.
Neryo mwanyikangya olusi lwamagetsi wengebe, olu kangabenie ngekiyo, olukasenda lukalwa oko kitumbi kyobwami kyoMungu neKyana kyembuli

lukalaba omo katikati kenzira yomuyi; kandi, oko misirya ibiri yolusi hari omuti wengebe nemisindo yebiguma ikumi na bibiri, akaheta kwebiguma oburi mukera; nebikoma byomuti oyo byabya busana nerilamya ebihanda.
Sihendisyaswabya kandi ekindu ekitakire, nikwa ekitumbi kyoMungu kyobwami nekyeKyana kyembuli kyasyabya mugo, nabagombe buwe basyamukuka mira;
basyalola oko busu buwe, nerina riwe ryasyabua oko masu wabo.
Kandi sibwendisyahombera; neryo sibari nobwaga bwekyakakala kyoluseke kutse eryuba, kusangwa oMukama Mungu asyabya kyakakala kyabo, basyasinga kera na kera.
Neryo mwabuga nage ati, Ebinywa ebi ni byerikiriribwa nebyekwenene. NoMukama Mungu webirimu byabaminyereri, abirituma omulaika wuwe erikangya abagombe buwe ebitolere erihika luba.
Kandi lebaya, ngasa luba.
Omuyisa ari nabakabika ebinywa byeriminyerera ryekitabu eki.
Ingye Yoane oyo wowa nerilangira emyatsi eyi. Neryo nabere nabiowa nerilangirayo, monagwa ahisi erikukamira oko bisandu byomulaika oyo wanyikangayayo;
nikwa mwabuga nage ati, Siwangakola utya! ingye ndi mugombe mulikyenyu noko bagala benyu baminyereri, noko bakabika ebinywa byekitabu eki. OMungu iyo wakukamira.
Neryo mwabuga nage ati, Subohe ebinywa byeriminyerera ryekitabu eki, kusangwa endambi iri hakuhi.
Omukola nabi akwamirire erikola nabi, nabatisirire babye batisirire, naba tunganene bakwamirire erikola ebitunganene, nababuyirire bakwamirire eribya babuyirire.
Lebaya, ngasa luba, ngaleta ebihembo, eririha oburi mundu busana nekyo abirikola.
Ingye indi Alfa na Omega, owerimbere nowenyuma, eritsuka nenduli.
Omuyisa ari kwabo abakeraya esyokanzu syabo, ibatoka eribya nehamuli yokomuti wengebe ibatoka eriingira omo muyi erilaba omo marimbo.
Eyihya iri syombwa nabakumu nabasingiri nabiti nabakasaba esisumba, noburi mundu oyu kanza eribiha nerikola amabihi.
Ingye Yesu nabiribatumira omulaika wage neritulago eri busana nesyokanisa, Ingye ndi ndina nolubuto byaDawidi, engununu yengyakya eyikakanga.
EKirimu noMuheruki bati, Mwase. Noyu kowa naye akabuga ati, Mwase. Noyu kwire enyota ase, noyu kasonda imaye amagetsi wengebe butsira obuguri.
Ngasagisaya oburi mundu oyu kowa ebinywa byerimi nyerera ryekitabu eki; omundu amatomeka kubyo, Mungu asyamutomekako amalige owakahulawa omo kitabu eki,
nomundu amalusya oko binywa byekitabu kyeriminyerera eri, Mungu asyamulusya okwisangira oko muti wengebe noko muyi abuyirire, ebikahulawa omo kitabu eki.
Oyo katulago oko myatsi eyi ati, Kwenene ngasa luba. Bibye bitya. Wase, oMukama Yesu!
Olukogo lwoMukama Yesu lubye nababuyirire bosi. Bibye bitya.
